localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: 🚀 Codekeep lets you store and share bits of code and text with other users. Snippets can be organized into folders/labels for instant reuse. Create code screenshots and link it with codekeep.
blogPost.body: 🚀 Codekeep lets you store and share bits of code and text with other users. Snippets can be organized into folders/labels for instant reuse. Create code screenshots and link it with codekeep.
blogPost.title: CodeKeep - Organize, discover & share code snippets
blogPost.author: JP1016

localize.description: 🚀 Codekeep 可以让你存储并与其他用户分享代码和文本片段。可以将代码片段组织到文件夹/标签中，以便即时重复使用。创建代码截图，并与codekeep链接。
localize.tagline: 组织、发现和共享代码片段

localize.description: 🚀 Codekeep 可以讓你存儲並與其他用戶分享代碼和文本片段。可以將代碼片段組織到文件夾/標籤中，以便即時重複使用。創建代碼截圖，並與codekeep鏈接。
localize.tagline: 組織、發現和共享代碼片段

next.excerpt: Previewed is a mockup generator which makes 3D accessible to everyone. Take snapshots from all angles and create animations that will engage your audience.
next.title: Previewed 3D - Pixel perfect 3D device mockups & animations

localize.description: 预览是一款模拟生成器，它让每个人都能使用3D。从各个角度拍摄快照，并创建动画，吸引你的观众。
localize.tagline: 完美的像素3D设备模拟和动画。

localize.description: 預覽是一款模擬生成器，它讓每個人都能使用3D。從各個角度拍攝快照，並創建動畫，吸引你的觀衆。
localize.tagline: 完美的像素3D設備模擬和動畫。
